summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Project P Innovations website with focus on new frontend features. Backend APIs remain fully functional (100% success). All new frontend features successfully implemented: animated hero background, scrolling ticker with service items, updated 3-card services section, white hexagon logo, and footer contact numbers. Minor cosmetic issues found but no blocking functionality problems.

ui_bugs.issue: Missing spaces in hero headline text: 'Design thefuture ofAI products.' instead of 'Design the future of AI products.'

design_issues.issue: Dashboard shows only 2 tabs instead of expected 3 (Jobs, Applications, Emails)
Console hydration warnings about span elements inside select/option elements

passed_tests: Backend: All 11 API endpoints (health, jobs, admin, applications) - 100% success
Backend: Admin login with correct credentials (admin@projectpinnovations.com)
Backend: File upload validation and processing
Backend: JWT authentication and protected endpoints
Frontend: Hero section loads with animated gradient background
Frontend: Floating orb animations (3 orbs with different animation patterns)
Frontend: Scrolling ticker with 7 service items and orange dot separators
Frontend: Services section shows 3 cards with correct titles (AI Products, AI Solutions & Automation, Talent & Hiring Consultancy)
Frontend: Logo displays as white hexagon outline with no fill
Frontend: Footer shows UK phone (+44 7717 206215) and India phone (+91 9000 242484)
Frontend: Navigation to Careers page with job listings display
Frontend: Navigation to Apply page with functional form
Frontend: Application form submission end-to-end with file upload
Frontend: Admin login functionality and dashboard access
Integration: Frontend-backend data flow for applications
Integration: File upload from UI to backend storage
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix hero headline spacing issue (missing spaces between 'the' and 'future' and 'of' and 'AI'). Optional: resolve console hydration warnings for select elements and verify admin dashboard shows all 3 expected tabs.
